sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Proposals for the encouragement and promoting of religion and learning in the foreign plantations and to induce such of the clergy of this kingdom, as are persons of sobriety and abilities, to accept of a mission into those parts. Bray, Thomas, 1658-1730. Lawrence, Thomas, Sir, b. ca. 1645. Present state of the Protestant religion in Mary-land.
4 p.
s.n., [London : ca. 1695]
Caption title. Attributed to Thomas Bray. Cf. NUC pre-1956. With 6 bishops' signatures, p. 2. Place and date of publication from Wing. "The present state of the Protestant religion in Mary-land" (p. 3-4) is written by Thomas Lawrence. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

4 p.
s.n., [London : ca. 1695]

"The present state of the Protestant religion in Mary-land" (p. 3-4) is written by Thomas Lawrence. Cf. NUC pre-1956. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
